comments.comment:
Putting on a new dress, the Emperor of Roses is clad in pure white.
As her dress changes, her attitude changes as well, and even her battle style is different from her regular self.
Her beloved sword, Aestus Estus, senses that, and changes its color from crimson to platinum.

Height/Weight: 150cm, 42kg
Origin: History
Region: Rome
Alignment: Chaotic-Bride
Gender: Female
Umu, this is my long-awaited wedding dress!

Migraine: B
A curse inherited from when she was alive.
Due having chronic migraines, her success rate of skills dealing with mental status declines considerably.
Nero is a (self-proclaimed) artist, but due to this skill, it is difficult for her to completely exhibit her talent.

『Fax Caelestis』
Rank: B+
NP Type: Anti-Personnel
Star-Rushing Rose of Closure.
A special skill derived from Aestus Domus Aurea.
In reality, this is merely a sword-technique, but with the perfect marriage of flashiness, elegance, and the impact of the wedding dress, this should be a Noble Phantasm, right? Since she saw it that way, it came to be treated as a Noble Phantasm.

It is not like there were feelings of jealousy about the new skill of that blue fox Caster.

In the Year 59 (some say 60), to pay homage to the Olympics held in Greece, she started the "Nero Fest," to be held once every five years.
The competition held three divisions of music, horse-riding, gymnastics, and she participated in a number of those.
In the Year 69, she was dethroned by the rebellion and fled from Rome.
During her escape, she realized she couldn't get away and decided to end her life.

Ascending to the throne at 17, she gained overwhelming popularity with the people for her generous policies.
She's also well versed in foreign politics, and the popularity towards Rome in the England (Britannia) of later years was due to Nero's diplomacy.
Persia also frequently praised Nero, and even after her death, they still showed respect towards Rome because it was Nero's country.

In her former life, Nero remained without a spouse until death, and even after becoming a Servant, she still hasn't encountered that special someone throughout all her battles.

In other words, this is a form that's only in her dreams, a place where she did not join the Holy Grail War in a certain virtual world.

voiceLines.name: Birthday
voiceLines.subtitle:
Your birthday, huh? Then stay inside.
Only a fool would refuse to spend some quality time with me when I'm wearing an outfit like this.

voiceLines.name: During an Event
voiceLines.subtitle:
Ooh! Seems like things are heating up!
To arms, Master! Let's crack some skulls!

voiceLines.name: Conversation 1
voiceLines.subtitle:
Hmm. We're starting to run low on funds, Master.
Get out there and earn us some more.

voiceLines.name: Conversation 2
voiceLines.subtitle:
Marriage talk, huh!
I try to improve myself every day, dreaming that the day will come!

voiceLines.name: Conversation 3
voiceLines.subtitle:
You don't think this is the right outfit for a fight?
But a bridal gown by definition is a woman's battle garb... Just you wait, Master. I'll protect you like never before.

voiceLines.name: Likes
voiceLines.subtitle:
Me of course!
...Or at least I'd like to say as much, but that would be a lie with me in this outfit...
But maybe anything that shares a connection with me. I think that's what matters most.

voiceLines.name: Dislikes
voiceLines.subtitle:
What do I hate? It goes without saying.
Anyone who cheats deserves to go straight to hell.

voiceLines.name: About the Holy Grail
voiceLines.subtitle:
The Holy Grail... Hmm... What a terrible name...
Try not to mention it in my presence... It's only going to make my headache worse.

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 1
voiceLines.subtitle:
You want to know why I changed into a wedding dress?
Fufufu. Do you really have to ask?
You know me! I did it because I wanted to!

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 2
voiceLines.subtitle:
But you know, I don't really know what it means to be a bride.
Hmm... It's like floating in air, but it's far from relaxing. You just can't shake the feeling that you're missing something...

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 3
voiceLines.subtitle:
Huh? So what's missing is everyday routine?
I see... Then I'll give cooking a try.
Trust me on this. I'm great at everything I do, and I know what you like.
I mean, uh, you like octopus, right?

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 4
voiceLines.subtitle:
How many times have we practiced so far?
Cooking, shopping, theater visits, and trifle disagreements here and there...
U-Umu. There's nothing wrong with that. In fact, I think it's a good thing. I have a feeling that I'm finally pretty close to understanding what it means to be a bride.

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 5
voiceLines.subtitle:
...Umu, that was a really nice dream. So satisfying.
But "was" doesn't quite fit. Our contract is going to continue into the future. It's a very happy ending.
However, I don't think it's good for me to call you "Master" forever. We should come up with pet names for each other.
I know it lacks originality, but I think I'll call you "darling"!

voiceLines.name: Level up
voiceLines.subtitle: I'll grow stronger and more gorgeous than ever!

voiceLines.name: Ascension 2
voiceLines.subtitle: [id 100600_0_G020]Umu, indeed. The more blessings of the bells, the better.

voiceLines.name: Ascension 1
voiceLines.subtitle:
[id 100600_0_G030]U-Umu...
I don't mind growing stronger, [delay 4]but my dress is starting to feel a bit tight...

voiceLines.name: Ascension 3
voiceLines.subtitle:
[id 100600_0_G040]Fufufu, I changed clothes again.[delay 5]
I tried to look more like a bride. What do you think?

voiceLines.name: Ascension 4
voiceLines.subtitle:
[id 100600_0_G050]Ohh... This is the pinnacle of Rome, [delay 3]the most beautiful combat wedding dress in the world!
[id 100600_0_G051]You and I are bound to turn some heads!

voiceLines.name: Summon
text:
Umu... I am back with a new dress![r]
Call me Bride Saber, or Nero Bride!
voiceLines.subtitle:
Umu... I am back with a new dress!
Call me Bride Saber, or Nero Bride!

voiceLines.name: Attack 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Ngh!

voiceLines.name: Attack 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Here I come!

voiceLines.name: Attack 3
voiceLines.subtitle: Hahh!

voiceLines.name: Extra Attack
voiceLines.subtitle: This is my big scene!

voiceLines.name: Skill 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Take each and every bouquet!

voiceLines.name: Skill 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Rekindle your love!

voiceLines.name: Battle Start 1
voiceLines.subtitle: A glorious victory awaits!

voiceLines.name: Battle Start 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Well done on making me look good!

voiceLines.name: Victory 1
voiceLines.subtitle: It's a bit tight in the chest, but that's how it goes!

voiceLines.name: Victory 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Umu, did that rekindle your love for me, Master?

voiceLines.name: Damage 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Unh?!

voiceLines.name: Damage 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Could you be any more uncivilized?

voiceLines.name: Incapacitated 1
voiceLines.subtitle: The maiden's...most cherished desire...

voiceLines.name: Incapacitated 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Can't you read the situation?

voiceLines.name: Command Card 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Hah!

voiceLines.name: Command Card 2
voiceLines.subtitle: As expected!

voiceLines.name: Command Card 3
voiceLines.subtitle: Oh, you're precious!

voiceLines.name: Noble Phantasm Card
voiceLines.subtitle: Clear the way! The emperor is coming through!

voiceLines.name: Noble Phantasm
voiceLines.subtitle:
[id 100600_0_B050]Sunlight of spring, dancing flowers!
[id 100600_0_B052]The winds of May that brush your cheeks! The blessed bells that ring all the way beyond stella!
[id 100600_0_B056]Open, Nuptiae Domus Aurea!
[id 100600_0_B054]Sing, [id 100600_0_B055]Fax Caelestis!
[id 100600_0_B058]Its love...burns bright as the flame!

voiceLines.name: Noble Phantasm
voiceLines.subtitle:
[id 100600_0_B800]Sunlight of spring, dancing flowers!
[id 100600_0_B802]The winds of May that brush your cheeks! The blessed bells that ring all the way beyond stella!
[id 100600_0_B806]Open, Nuptiae Domus Aurea!
[id 100600_0_B804]Sing, [id 100600_0_B805]Fax Caelestis!
[id 100600_0_B809]Victory is mine!
